question: Analyze the social media presence of companies in the technology industry and identify the most engaging platforms.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies in the technology industry and gather their basic information such as name, description, and active status.
Extract social media engagement metrics for the identified technology companies, focusing on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube.
Aggregate the engagement metrics (likes, comments, engagement rate) for each social media platform and compare between them to identify the most engaging platform for technology companies.
Compile findings into a report summarizing the social media presence of the technology companies, highlighting engagement trends and platform preferences.
